title: Emergency Info Card Generator
description: Generate a printable emergency details card for travel and outdoor trips.
pageDescription: Create a compact emergency profile to carry in your wallet, pack, or tank bag.

sections.title: What To Include
content: Your legal name and preferred emergency contact.
Critical medical data like blood type and severe allergies.
A reachable phone number that works internationally if possible.

sections.title: Best Practices
content: Keep the card brief so responders can scan it quickly.
Print one copy for your person and one for your luggage/pack.
Review and update details before each major trip.

sections.title: Limitations
content: This tool does not replace official medical ID systems.
Use local emergency numbers and region-specific guidance for your destination.
Avoid including highly sensitive data you do not want on a physical card.
